title: Donate to Bill Assistance Program
description: A customer wants to make a one-time donation to the utility's charitable fund that helps low-income customers pay their bills.

tasks.description: Provide the customer with information about the assistance program.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the purpose of the program.

tasks.description: Process the customer's requested donation amount via their preferred payment method.
Provide the customer with a receipt for their tax-deductible donation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a receipt to the customer's email.
